name: Ke Rulen Los Petas
storyline:
After the repression to which the country was subjected with the coming to power of General Charoen, new classes appeared that monopolized power based primarily on preventing access to culture for the less favored classes and creating a climate of confusion that would end up inevitably leading to the most terrible ethnic conflicts. 
 
Willis, inveterate smoker, sniffer, picaor ..., of everything they throw at him. He is the last survivor of a resistance group against the corrupt warlord-general-dictator Charoen. He is the only one who knows the traitor Karakulo, who in turn knows the situation of the warehouse where Charoen keeps all the drugs that his secret police confiscate 
to the mob before their redistribution. Karakuio is believed to be hiding in the cells of the dictator's mansion among the rest of the prisoners
